content: Incorporate a brain-teaser into the prompt by adding a game element that challenges users to match the design principles and techniques to the correct architect featured on the HTML page. To make it even more challenging, add a timer to create a sense of urgency. Moreover, investigate the ripple effect of the Modernist movement on current architectural practices, and extrapolate on the future trajectory of this field. Use advanced coding techniques to elevate the user experience and create a memorable web page that leaves a lasting impression.
